measurements_data.comments: 2 (Port of Prince metro area, 0.7 kg/person/day; rural, 0.41 kg/person/day); rural rate is for Cap Haitien data, which is representative of the rest of the country and involves both rural and urban populations; Port of Prince data is from 2010 and Cap Haitien's from 2016

measurements_data.comments: CLF: Calculated assuming that total waste collected in the metropolitan area of Port of Prince is disposed in the Trutier landfill as a percentage of the total waste generated countrywide; UA: Includes all waste collected from other urban and rural areas
